FuncDef: This command specifies the data encapsulation for an ATM PVCC delimited SAP. The definition references RFC 2684,Multiprotocol Encapsulation over ATM AAL5,and to the ATM Forum LAN Emulation specification.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the encapsulation type. Values-aal5snap-bridged - Bridged encapsulation for LLC encapsulated circuit (LLC/SNAP precedes protocol datagram) as defined in RFC 2684..
